AREA_INT: Whoops, it looks like your HTML file isn't formatted properly.
BYE_TXT: Login again to edit your pages!
ED_ERR_EDIT: This page does not contain any editable area.
ERR_404_DB: Cannot access the database. Please check the permissions. (ERR_404_DB)
ERR_404_DIR: Cannot acces the folder. Please check the permissions. (ERR_404_DIR)
ERR_404_FILE: Cannot access the file. Please check the permissions. (ERR_404_FILE)
ERR_404_NOTF: The requested file is empty or not available. (ERR_404_NOTF)
ERR_404_UPL: Cannot acces the uploads folder. Please check the permissions. (ERR_404_UPL)
ERR_AUTH_BRUT: You entered the password too often. Your account is blocked for max. 2h.
ERR_AUTH_REST: You are not allowed to edit this page.
ERR_AUTH_SEC: It was not possible to set up a secure connection.
ERR_JS: An error occurred in your JavaScript - please debug and upload your static web pages again.
ERR_TASK: This page is currently edited by another user.
ERR_TASK_REFR: This page is currently edited by another user. Please try again later.
ERR_TASK_SAVE: This page is currently edited by another user. Saving is possible when the user has finished editing.
ERR_UNKN: An unknown error occurred. Please inform the webmaster.
ERR_UPL_IMG: Please do only upload JPG, PNG or GIF files.
ERR_UPL_SIZE: Please do only upload files with max. 5MB.
JO_ADV: Dead-simple contenteditable based CMS available at Darkcraft.digital!
MSG_LEAV: Are you sure you want to leave?
SET_SYST_HTPS: Safety mode (Only apply if you use SSL)
